trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects.
A <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> has a StylusPointCollection that contains <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects collected from a stylus and digitizer.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>具有包含 StylusPointCollection<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>从触笔与数字化器收集的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: You can use the StylusPointCollection to customize the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 StylusPointCollection 自定义<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>使用指定的类<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: A generic IEnumerable of type <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 类型的泛型 IEnumerable <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref>将添加到<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>。

The length of points is 0.
-or- The objects in stylusPoints have incompatible objects.
trans-unit.target: -或- 中的对象 stylusPoints 具有不兼容对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class with specified points.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>与指定点的类。

trans-unit.source: A generic IEnumerable of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that specifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 类型的泛型 IEnumerable <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> ，它指定<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>要添加到对象<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: points is .
The length of points is 0.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class that may initially contain the specified number of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>类，该类可能最初包含指定的数目的<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: When you use the StylusPointCollection constructor to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, you specify it's `initialCapacity`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用 StylusPointCollection 构造函数来创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>，可指定它的`initialCapacity`。</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: However, you can add more <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以添加更多<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>对象通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> can initially contain.
initialCapacity is negative.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class that contains the properties specified in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>包含中指定的属性的类<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects added to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> must have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that is compatible with `stylusPointDescription`.
trans-unit.target: 所有<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>必须具有<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>与兼容`stylusPointDescription`。</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that specifies the additional properties stored in each <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> ，它指定在每个存储的其他属性<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: stylusPointDescription is .

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class that is the specified size and contains the properties specified in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>类指定的大小并且包含中指定的属性<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> is created with the capacity to hold the specified number of <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A>构造函数来创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>创建具有容量以容纳的指定的数<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can add more <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects than `initialCapacity` by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加更多<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>对象比`initialCapacity`通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that specifies the additional properties stored in each <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>.

A new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains copies of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects in the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.

Finds the intersection of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description*> property.

trans-unit.source: `subsetToReformatTo` is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> which describes a subset of values belonging to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `subsetToReformatTo`是<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>哪一种适合的值属于子集<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> method to get a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that intersects the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> of the current <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>要获取<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription><xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>的当前<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection></xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>相交</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>方法</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Reformat method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> that contains the same <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects as those belonging to the current <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 重新设置格式方法返回<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>，其中包含相同<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>的对象作为属于当前<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in the new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> uses `subsetToReformatTo` as the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.

> [!NOTE] > Reformat uses the constraints from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property, even if the constraints in `subsetToReformatTo` are different.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 重新设置格式使用从约束<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>的<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>属性，即使在约束`subsetToReformatTo`不同。</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `subsetToReformatTo` uses the values 0 and 1023 for <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> whereas <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> uses the values 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`subsetToReformatTo`使用值 0 到 1023年<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>而<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>使用值 0 和 255。</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>

trans-unit.source: Reformat returns a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> using the values, 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: 重新设置格式返回<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>使用值 0 和 255 之间。</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to intersect with the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that has a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that is a subset of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> and the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> uses.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>具有<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>的指定子集<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> ，当前<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>使用。

trans-unit.source: subsetToReformatTo is not a subset of the property.
Removes the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> at the specified position from the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
The position at which to remove the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> is connected to a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> and there is only one <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 设置指定<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>中指定的位置。

Converts the property values of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects into a 32-bit signed integer array.
